short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables you to save bookmarks super fast.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I told the author of extension Fast Bookmark to update some a bug, but he had no any response. 
So I cloned and refactored it.
Include such new features:
 - hotkey to change the base dir when use the Create New Folder feature
 - automatically adjust bookmark folder order by moving new to most front position
 - sync data by using Chrome Storage api


old extension link here: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/fast-bookmark/bkolccbclokgkhcciikgbkcmnagimjib
